Package com.taco.suit_lady.util

Class RandomTools

java.lang.Object
com.taco.suit_lady.util.tools.RandomSL
public class RandomTools extends Object
A utility for generating pseudo-random numbers.

    • nextInt

      public int nextInt​(int bound)
      Generates a pseudo-random, uniformly distributed int in the range [0, bound) if bound is non-negative, or (bound, 0] if bound is negative.
      Parameters:
      bound - The lower or upper bound (exclusive).
      Returns:
      int
      See Also:
      Random.nextInt()

    • nextInt

      public int nextInt​(int min, int max)
      Generates a pseudo-random, uniformly distributed int in the range [min, max).
      Parameters:
      min - The lower bound (inclusive).
      max - The upper bound (exclusive).
      Returns:
      int
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - When min > max.
      See Also:
      Random.nextInt(int)

    • nextDouble

      public double nextDouble​(double bound)
      Generates a pseudo-random, uniformly distributed double in the range [0.0, bound) if bound is non-negative, or ( bound, 0.0] if bound is negative.
      Parameters:
      bound - The lower or upper bound (exclusive).
      Returns:
      double
      See Also:
      Random.nextDouble()

    • nextDouble

      public double nextDouble​(double min, double max)
      Generates a pseudo-random, uniformly distributed double in the range [min, max).
      Parameters:
      min - The lower bound (inclusive).
      max - The upper bound (exclusive).
      Returns:
      double
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - When min > max.
      See Also:
      Random.nextDouble()

    • nextGaussian

      public double nextGaussian​(double min, double max, double mean, double sd)
      Generates a pseudo-random, normally distributed double about the specified mean with the specified standard deviation, sd, in the range [min, max].
      Parameters:
      min - The minimum value (inclusive).
      max - The maximum value (inclusive).
      mean - The mean (>= min and <= max).
      sd - The standard deviation.
      Returns:
      The random integer (>= min and <= max).

    • nextGaussian

      public double nextGaussian​(double min, double max, double sd)
      Generates a pseudo-random, normally distributed double about a mean of betwen min and max with the specified standard deviation, sd, in the range [min, max].
      Parameters:
      min - The minimum value (inclusive).
      max - The maximum value (inclusive).
      sd - The standard deviation.
      Returns:
      The random integer (>= min and <= max).

    • nextGaussian

      public double nextGaussian​(double mean, double sd)
      Generates a pseudo-random, normally distributed double about the specified mean with the specified standard deviation, sd.
      Parameters:
      mean - The mean (<= min and <= max).
      sd - The standard deviation.
      Returns:
      The random integer (>= min and <= max).

    • nextSkewedBoundedDouble

      public double nextSkewedBoundedDouble​(double min, double max, double skew, double bias)
      Generates a bounded pseudo-random skewed double.
      Parameters:
      min - The minimum bound (inclusive).
      max - The maximum bound (exclusive).
      skew - The degree to which the values cluster around the mode of the distribution; higher values mean tighter clustering.
      bias - The tendency of the mode to approach the min, max or midpoint value; positive values bias toward max, negative values toward min.
      Returns:
      double

      public double next​(Number bound)
